form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the equitable restoration of eligibility for provision of Department of Veterans Affairs memorial headstones and markers for eligible spouses and dependent children of veterans whose remains are unavailable.

section.header: Eligibility of veterans’ spouses and dependent children whose remains are unavailable for Department of Veterans Affairs memorial headstones and markers
section.text: Section 2306(b)(2) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subparagraph (B), by striking An individual who dies on or after November 11, 1998, who is the and inserting The; and
in subparagraph (C), by striking An individual who dies on or after November 11, 1998, who is an and inserting An.
